author: Xbox
description:
This week we had a massive showcase featuring cool announcements, new Game Pass drops, and of course, a new way to play anywhere! Let’s jump in.

author: Xbox
description:
METAL GEAR SOLID Δ: SNAKE EATER releases August 28, 2025! Pre-Orders Now Available!
METAL GEAR SOLID Δ: SNAKE EATER is a remake of the 2004 game METAL GEAR SOLID 3: SNAKE EATER.
The remake maintains what players loved from the original, such as the story, characters, voice acting, gameplay, and music, but is presented now in an even more immersive experience.
SNAKE VS BOMBERMAN for Xbox Series X|S: https://www.xbox.com/games/store/metal-gear-solid-d-snake-eater/9NX56N49H8V0
Take control of Snake and face off with Bomberman in this special side mode. Blast 'em away in each stage!

author: Xbox
description:
Still Wakes the Deep: Siren’s Rest is a story expansion to the 3-time BAFTA award-winning narrative horror game Still Wakes the Deep, and is available on Xbox Series X|S and PC on June 18. 

It’s 1986. Over a decade has passed since the Beira D incident. A specialist saturation dive team with a forensic focus descends into the North Sea to uncover the truth about what happened to the oil rig that sank without a trace. You want answers, but something down there wants you.

Submerge yourself in the latest first-person narrative adventure from The Chinese Room, creator of critically acclaimed games such as Amnesia: A Machine for Pigs, Everybody’s Gone to the Rapture, and Dear Esther.
